Power_Sink.display_help: Power Sink leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Long

Healing_Aura.display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Heal_Other.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Clear_Mind.display_help: Frees an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Also, grants target clearer Perception to see hidden foes. Protection will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
Clear_Mind.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception
Clear_Mind.display_target_help: Your mind has been cleared of negative effects, and you are granted temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and your Perception is improved.
Clear_Mind.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
Clear_Mind.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects.

Fortitude.display_help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single ally's chance to hit, Damage, and Defense to all attacks. Recharge: Long
Fortitude.display_target_help: You have been given the gift of Fortitude. Your chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks have all been increased.
Fortitude.display_attacker_hit: You greatly increase the To Hit, Damage and Defense of {PlayerDest}.
Fortitude.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your To Hit, Damage and Defense.

Recovery_Aura.display_help: The Recovery Aura dramatically increases the Endurance recovery rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long
Recovery_Aura.display_target_help: The Recovery Aura is improving your Endurance Recovery Rate, allowing you to battle longer!
Recovery_Aura.display_attacker_hit: You increase the Endurance Recovery of {PlayerDest}.

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Bone_Smasher.display_help: This melee attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a good chance to Disorient the target. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Power_Push.display_help: This ranged attack deals little damage, but sends the target flying for a great distance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Push.display_short_help: Ranged Minor DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Power_Boost.display_help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

Whirling_Hands.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This melee attack is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Sniper_Blast.display_help: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Power_Burst.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

Kinetic_Shield.display_help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
Kinetic_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Kinetic_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Dampening_Field.display_help: Your body resonates a mild Dampening Field that absorbs kinetic energy from physical weapons. This auto power permanently reduces all incoming Smashing and Lethal damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Power_Shield.display_help: This Power Shield creates a Electro-Magnetic shield around you that can deflect non-physical attacks. Your Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks is increased as these attacks are reflected or refracted off the shield. Power Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. Recharge: Fast
Power_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Power_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Power Shield increased you Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks.

Entropy_Shield.display_help: Entropy Shield diminishes and dampens the energy of controlling type effects. The shield makes you resistant to Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilization, and enemy Teleportation for as long as you can keep this toggle power active. Entropy Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. Recharge: Fast
Entropy_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Teleport, DeBuff DEF)
Entropy_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You are now highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep, Knockback, Repel, and enemy Teleportation.

Energy_Protection.display_help: Your ability to channel energy makes you naturally resistant to Energy, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Energy_Drain.display_help: Energy Drain leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance and Hit Points. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Long

Overload.display_help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Overload.display_short_help: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special
Overload.display_attacker_hit: You are Overloading your Energy Aura. You now have extreme Defense to all attacks except Psionics and your Max HP has been increased.

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Power_Burst.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Power Burst unleashes a massive amount of energy dealing very high damage at short distances. The impact from this burst often knocks back most foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

Explosive_Blast.display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets backwards. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Explosive_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

Nova.display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Nova.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback, Self -Recovery

Power_Thrust.display_help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends them flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Bone_Smasher.display_help: The Bone Smasher is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Stun.display_help: Stun deals a little bit of damage, but Disorients its target a great deal. This attack can Disorient most opponents. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Power_Boost.display_help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Barrage.display_help: You perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Energy_Punch.display_help: You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Bone_Smasher.display_help: A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Whirling_Hands.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Energy_Transfer.display_help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Energy_Transfer.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP

Flares.display_help: A quick attack that throws Flares at the target. Little damage, but very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Flares.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Incinerate.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent at melee range. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Fire_Breath.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fiery_Embrace.display_help: Significantly boosts the damage of all your Fire attacks for quite a while. Also increases the damage of all your other non-fire based attacks for a short while. Recharge: Very Long
Fiery_Embrace.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner fire with your {PowerName} and now all your attacks are significantly more deadly.

Combustion.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Consume.display_help: You can drain body heat from all nearby foes in order to replenish your own Endurance. The more foes affected, the more Endurance is gained. Foes suffer minimal Fire damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long

Blazing_Bolt.display_help: A long range beam of fire that blasts your foes. Like most sniper attacks, this power has a bonus to its chance to hit, but is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Blazing_Bolt.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Blaze.display_help: A short range, but devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Blazing_Aura.display_help: While active, you are surrounded by flames that burn all foes that attempt to enter melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Blazing_Aura.display_target_help: You are burning due to being too near the Blazing Aura.

Fire_Shield.display_help: While this power is active, Fire Shield gives you good resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage as well as protection from Disorient effects. Recharge: Very Fast
Fire_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Fire, Lethal, Smash, Cold, Disorient)
Fire_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, and Cold damage.

Healing_Flames.display_help: You can concentrate for a few moments to heal yourself. The power of the flames can also protect you from Toxic Damage for a while. Recharge: Long

Temperature_Protection.display_help: Temperature Protection gives you strong resistance to Fire damage, and some resistance to Cold damage as well. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Consume.display_help: You can drain body heat from all nearby foes in order to replenish your own Endurance. The more foes affected, the more Endurance is gained. Foes suffer minimal Fire damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long

Plasma_Shield.display_help: While this power is active, you are surrounded by pure plasma. The Plasma Shield gives you resistance to Energy, Negative Energy, and Fire damage. Plasma Shield also gives your protection from Sleep and Hold effects. Recharge: Very Fast
Plasma_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Energy, Negative, Fire, Hold, Sleep)
Plasma_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You are now more resistant to Energy, Negative Energy, and Fire damage.

Burn.display_help: You can ignite the ground beneath you, freeing yourself from Immobilization effects. Foes that enter the flames you leave behind will take damage. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Burn.display_target_help: The ground beneath you is on fire and you are burning.

Fiery_Embrace.display_help: Significantly boosts the damage of all your Fire attacks for quite a while. Also increases the damage of all your other non-fire based attacks for a short while. Recharge: Very Long
Fiery_Embrace.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner fire with your {PowerName} and now all your attacks are significantly more deadly.

Rise_of_the_Phoenix.display_help: If you are defeated, you can rise from the ashes. The fiery resurrection blasts nearby foes with an explosion and knocks them down and Disorients them. You will revive with about half of your Hit Points and Endurance. Rise of the Phoenix will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Rise_of_the_Phoenix.display_target_help: You have risen from the ashes. You are untouchable for 15 seconds and are protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds.
Rise_of_the_Phoenix.display_attacker_hit: You rise from the ashes with the power of the Phoenix.

Scorch.display_help: This power engulfs your hands in flames, and can ignite the target of your Scorching attack. Once on fire, the target will suffer damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Fire_Sword.display_help: Through concentration, you can create a Sword of Fire that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Cremate.display_help: A slow but devastating attack. Cremate clobbers your foes with a massive 2 handed fiery smash that leaves your foe set on fire. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Incinerate.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing very high damage over a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Breath_of_Fire.display_help: This allows you to spew forth fire from your mouth, burning all foes within its narrow cone. This is a very accurate attack that can deal good damage at a close range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Fire_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing moderate damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Greater_Fire_Sword.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to create an enhanced Sword of Fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Greater Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Flares.display_help: A quick attack that throws Flares at the target. Little damage, but very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Flares.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Ball.display_help: Hurls an exploding Fireball that consumes a targeted foe, and all nearby enemies. Anyone in that explosion is burned and set ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fire_Ball.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Rain_of_Fire.display_help: Summons a Rain of Fire over a targeted location, burning foes within a large area. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Rain_of_Fire.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Breath.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Fire_Breath.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

Blaze.display_help: A short range, but devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Inferno.display_help: Unleashes a massive fiery explosion to devastate all nearby enemies and set them ablaze. Inferno deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Inferno.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Ring_of_Fire.display_help: Immobilizes your target in a Ring of Fire, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Rings to Immobilize. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Ring_of_Fire.display_target_help: The Ring of Fire is burning you and preventing you from moving.

Soot.display_help: Incapacitates a distant foe by Charring them with smoldering soot and cinders. The target is left helpless, choking on the soot. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Soot.display_target_help: The Soot is causing damage to you and preventing you from acting.

Fire_Cages.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes in Fire Cages, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Cages to Immobilize. Fire Cages is slower and less damaging than Ring of Fire, but can capture multiple targets. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Fire_Cages.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize
Fire_Cages.display_target_help: The Fire Cage is burning you and preventing you from moving.

Smoke.display_help: Covers all foes near your target in clouds of Smoke. The villains are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Smoke.display_target_help: The Smoke is reducing your visual range and chance to hit.
Smoke.display_attacker_hit: You fill the area with {PowerName}, lowering the chance to hit and perception of {PlayerDest}!
Smoke.display_victim_hit: You have been blinded by the Smoke from {PlayerSource}. Your chance to hit and perception have been reduced.

Hot_Feet.display_help: While active, you heat the earth in a large area around yourself. Enemy movement is Slowed as they attempt to flee the immediate area. All foes in the affected area may also suffer some damage over time. You cannot fly and must be near the ground to use this power. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Hot_Feet.display_target_help: The ground is extremely hot and burning you. Your running speed is reduced.

Flashfire.display_help: You can bring forth a Flashfire to Disorient a group of foes and deal some damage over time. Target must be on the ground to activate Flashfire. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Flashfire.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Disorient

Cinders.display_help: Incapacitates foes around the caster by whirling Cinders around them. The targets are left helpless, choking on the soot. Recharge: Very Long

Bonfire.display_help: You can create a Bonfire that knocks back and burns any foes who try to pass through it. Recharge: Long
Bonfire.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Knockback

Fire_Imps.display_help: You can craft 3 small Fire Imps out of pure flame in a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only possess the most basic instincts. Fire Imps can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Very Long

Ring_of_Fire.display_help: Immobilizes your target in a Ring of Fire. Deals some damage over time. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Medium
Ring_of_Fire.display_target_help: The Ring of Fire is burning you and holding you motionless.

Fire_Sword.display_help: Through concentration, you can create a sword of fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Fire_Sword.display_target_help: The Fire Sword has caught you on fire.

Combustion.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Combustion.display_target_help: You have spontaneously combusted! You are burning!

Fire_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fire_Sword_Circle.display_target_help: The Fire Sword has caught you on fire.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Hot_Feet.display_help: While active, you heat the earth in a large area around yourself. Enemy movement is Slowed as they attempt to flee the immediate area. All foes in the affected area may also suffer some damage over time. You cannot fly and must be near the ground to use this power. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Hot_Feet.display_target_help: The ground below you is incredibly hot. You are burning and your running speed is reduced.

Personal_Force_Field.display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of any attacks that do get through. The Personal Force Field works both ways; while it is active, you can only use powers that affect yourself. Cannot be used with Rest. Recharge: Slow
Personal_Force_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} makes you virtually invulnerable to most attacks, but you can only cast powers on yourself while the Force Field is active.

Force_Bolt.display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Deflection_Shield.display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from Smashing, Lethal and all Melee attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage. You cannot stack multiple Deflection Shields on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Insulation Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Deflection_Shield.display_target_help: You have been encased in a Deflection Shield. Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal and Melee attacks is increased, and your ability to resist Toxic attacks is increased as well.
Deflection_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Smashing, Lethal and Melee attacks, as well as Toxic Damage, with your {PowerName}.
Deflection_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Smashing, Lethal and Melee attacks with a {PowerName} and grants you some resistance to Toxic damage.

Detention_Field.display_help: Encases a targeted foe in a Detention Force Field. The captured target cannot be harmed, is Immobilized, and cannot attack or aid their allies. The target can, however, use powers on themselves. Recharge: Slow
Detention_Field.display_target_help: You have been captured in a Detention Field. You cannot be harmed, however, you can only use powers which affect yourself.

Aid_Self.display_help: Allows you to heal yourself. This hypo also leaves you wide awake, and resistant to Disorientation effects. This power is interruptible. You must be at least level 14 and have Aid Other or Stimulant before selecting Aid Self.

Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attack types. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses to all attacks and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from all damage types with your {PowerName}.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from all damage types with a {PowerName}.

Repulsion_Bomb.display_help: Projects an expanding Force Bubble around an ally that knocks down and Disorients nearby foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Repulsion_Bomb.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Foe Knockdown, Disorient, Damage Moderate (Smash)

Force_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, this power keeps all foes at bay, protecting all allies inside from melee or short ranged attacks. More powerful foes may be able to penetrate the Force Bubble, but may slip and get knocked down and forced back if they try. Recharge: Slow
Force_Bubble.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} keeps your foes at bay.

Web_Grenade.display_help: Upon impact, the Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Fast
Web_Grenade.display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

Caltrops.display_help: You toss a handful of Caltrops at a targeted location and spread the tiny metal spikes over a large area. Any villains that pass over the Caltrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Caltrops.display_target_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Taser.display_help: The Taser is basically a stun-gun. This small device releases a high-voltage, low-amperage electrical charge that can Disorient most opponents with minimal damage. The Taser has a very short range. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Targeting_Drone.display_help: When this small device is activated, the small Targeting Drone hovers around your head and emits targeting laser sights. The lasers can dramatically improve your chance to hit and increase your Perception, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Targeting Drone also grants you resistance to powers that DeBuff your chance to hit. While in use, any sniper rifle shots you make will do additional damage. This is a toggle power and must be activated and deactivated manually. Like all toggle powers, while active, the Targeting Drone drains Endurance. Recharge: Slow
Targeting_Drone.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your chance to hit.

Smoke_Grenade.display_help: The Smoke Grenade envelops all those in the affected area in a cloud of smoke. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Smoke_Grenade.display_target_help: Your visual range and chance to hit have been reduced by the Smoke Grenade.
Smoke_Grenade.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} hits {PlayerDest} slightly reducing their chance to hit and dramatically reducing their perception!
Smoke_Grenade.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with a {PowerName} slightly decreasing your chance to hit and dramatically reducing your perception!

Auto_Turret.display_help: You can summon a Gun Drone. The Drone has an extremely fast fire rate and is equipped with a customized tracking system. Once locked on, the Drone will continue to unload a volley of lead into the target until it is destroyed. The Drone is armored, but can be destroyed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Crush.display_help: Creates a localized gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize a single foe. Crush can also bring down flying entities. This power deals Smashing damage over time and can Slow the movement of targets that escape its grasp. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Crush.display_target_help: You are being Crushed. You cannot move or fly.

Lift.display_help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams them to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Gravity_Distortion.display_help: Causes a single foe to be trapped in a misshapen gravity field, rendering them unable to take action. Gravity Distortion deals Smashing damage to the target. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gravity_Distortion.display_target_help: You have been caught in a Gravity Distortion. You cannot move and cannot fly.

Propel.display_help: You can open a gravitational rift and retrieve a heavy object, then Propel it at your foes for Smashing Damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Crushing_Field.display_help: Creates a large gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize multiple foes. Crushing Field can also bring down flying entities. Slower and less damaging than Crush, but can capture multiple targets. Crushing Field deals Smashing damage over time and can Slow the movement of targets that escape its grasp. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Crushing_Field.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Fly
Crushing_Field.display_target_help: You are being Crushed. You cannot move or fly.

Dimension_Shift.display_help: Your mastery of gravity allows you to manipulate dimensions, bringing multiple foes out of sync with reality. Your foes becomes completely intangible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space. Recharge: Slow
Dimension_Shift.display_target_help: You have been shifted into an alternate dimension. You powers cannot effect anyone but yourself, but you cannot be harmed.

Gravity_Distortion_Field.display_help: Creates a large, intensely misshapen Gravity Distortion Field that encompasses several foes, rendering them unable to take any action. Recharge: Very Long
Gravity_Distortion_Field.display_target_help: You are being held in a Gravity Distortion Field.

Wormhole.display_help: You can open a gravitational Wormhole behind a targeted foe and violently push them, and all nearby foes, through it. The victims are sent flying out the other end of the Wormhole and are left Disoriented. You determine the location of the Wormhole's end, and can place it high in the air if desired. More powerful foes may be resistant to the Wormhole effects. Recharge: Slow
Wormhole.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Foe Teleport, Disorient, Knockback

Singularity.display_help: You can create a very powerful Gravitational Singularity. The Singularity will engage your foes, assaulting them with various gravity powers. Any foes that attempt to approach the Singularity will be violently hurled away. The Singularity cannot be healed, but is highly resistant to all forms of damage and nearly impervious to Controlling type powers. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Very Long

Frozen_Armor.display_help: While this power is active, you coat yourself in rock hard Frozen Armor. The hardness of the Frozen Armor offers good defense to Smashing and Lethal attack as well as reduces Cold damage. Also, Fire attacks deal slightly less damage and you can resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Very Fast
Frozen_Armor.display_attacker_hit: You are now more defensive to Smashing and Lethal attacks and resistant to Cold and Fire damage.

Hoarfrost.display_help: Activating this power covers you in a thick layer of Hoarfrost. The frost can absorb the impact from enemy attacks, effectively increasing your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Hoarfrost also grants you resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
Hoarfrost.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your maximum Hit Points and grants you some resistance to Toxic damage.

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed and damage. Recharge: Very Fast
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: Your Attack speed, Running speed and damage are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.
Chilling_Embrace.display_victim_hit: The {PowerName} from {PlayerSource} slows your attack and movement speed, and reduces your damage.

Wet_Ice.display_help: When you activate this power, you cover yourself in a thick coating of slick, melting ice. This makes you slippery, leaving you nearly immune to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, Sleep, Slow and Knockback effects. This power also adds a slight increases your defense to all attacks except Psionics. Wet Ice also reduces Cold damage and grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Very Fast
Wet_Ice.display_short_help: Self, +DEF(All but Psionics), +Res(Cold, Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep, Slow, Knockback, DeBuff DEF)
Wet_Ice.display_attacker_hit: You are now covered in {PowerName}. Your defense is increased and you are highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, Sleep, Slow and Knockback.

Permafrost.display_help: Your body temperature permanently lowers to 33 degrees Fahrenheit. Permafrost gives you strong resistance to Cold damage, and some resistance to Fire damage as well. You also gain an inherent resistance to Slow effects. This power is always on and does not cost Endurance.

Icicles.display_help: While active, you form sharp icicles on your body that continuously cut all foes that attempt to enter melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Icicles.display_target_help: The shards of ice are doing damage to you.

Glacial_Armor.display_help: When you activate this power you cover yourself in Glacial ice. The crystalline matrix of the armor has refracting properties that make Energy and Negative Energy attacks less likely to land, and acts as a lens to increase your Perception to see hidden foes. The bitter cold of Glacial Armor also reduces Cold damage and also you to resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Very Fast
Glacial_Armor.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Energy, Negative), Res (Cold, DeBuff DEF), +Perception
Glacial_Armor.display_attacker_hit: You are now more defensive to energy and negative energy attacks. You are resistant to Cold and your Perception is increased.

Energy_Absorption.display_help: Activating this power draws moisture directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw moisture from adds to your own Endurance as well as Defense to all attacks except psionics. The first foe you absorb grants the highest Defense bonus, and you can absorb up to 10 foes. In addition to Defense, Energy Absorption also grants you resistance to Slow effects. If there are no foes within range, this power will fail. Recharge: Long
Energy_Absorption.display_short_help: PBAoE, Self +End, +DEF(All but Psionics), Res (Slow), Foe -End

Hibernate.display_help: When you activate this power, you encase yourself in a block of solid ice, making yourself invulnerable, though you are frozen solid and cannot act. While Hibernating within this block of ice, you heal damage and Recover Endurance at an incredible rate. You can emerge at will by deactivating the power, but you cannot Hibernate for more than 30 seconds. If you activate this power while in the air, you will fall. Recharge: Long
Hibernate.display_attacker_hit: You Hibernate in a block of ice, and are almost completely invulnerable while you heal at an astonishing rate.

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Frost_Breath.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

Freeze_Ray.display_help: Although this power deals very little damage, the Freeze Ray encases your foe in a block of ice, holding them helpless in place for a while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Freeze Ray.

Ice_Storm.display_help: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Ice_Storm.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), Foe -Recharge, -SPD
Ice_Storm.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Freezing Rain.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Bolt.

Blizzard.display_help: The massive damage from the Blizzard can Slow the attack rate of all your opponents in a large area, reducing their chance to hit and possibly knocking them back. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Very Long
Blizzard.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Extreme DoT(Cold), Foe -To-hit, -SPD, -Recharge, Knockback, Self -Recovery
Blizzard.display_target_help: You are caught in a freezing Blizzard. You are freezing and your Attack rate, chance to hit and Movement speed are reduced.

Chilblain.display_help: Immobilizes your target in an icy trap, dealing some Cold damage over time as well as slightly slowing the target's attack and movement speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Chilblain.display_target_help: The Chilblain is causing damage over time to you, and is holding you immobile. Your Attack rate and Running speed are also reduced.

Block_of_Ice.display_help: You can freeze a single foe in a Block of Ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be Slowed and take some Cold damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Block_of_Ice.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Frostbite.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes in icy traps. Deals minimal Cold damage over time and slightly Slows the targets. Slower and less damaging than Chilblain, but can capture multiple targets. More resilient foes may only be Slowed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Frostbite.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Cold), Foe Immobilize, -SPD, -Recharge
Frostbite.display_target_help: The Frostbite is causing damage over time to you, and is holding you immobile. Your Attack rate and Running speed are also reduced.

Arctic_Air.display_help: While this power is active, you are surrounded in a fog of Arctic Air that dramatically slows the attack and movement speed of nearby foes. The chill of Arctic Air is so bitter that many foes are forced to flee, albeit very slowly, from the immediate area. Others may attack their own allies, as the fog from the Arctic Air is thick and can cause much confusion. The cold air can also reduced the stealth capability of affected foes. Recharge: Slow
Arctic_Air.display_target_help: The Arctic Air has reduced your Running speed and Attack rate. The cold air has reduced your stealth capability and you are periodically confused, and may attack an incorrect target with your powers.
Arctic_Air.display_attacker_hit: You surround yourself in bitter cold {PowerName}, causing {PlayerSource} to shiver!
Arctic_Air.display_victim_hit: You shiver as the cold {PowerName} from {PlayerSource} hits you, your attack speed and movement rate have been reduced!

Shiver.display_help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Shiver.display_target_help: You are shivering. Your attack rate and movement speed are reduced.
Shiver.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} dramatically Slow the attack speed and movement of {PlayerDest}

Ice_Slick.display_help: You can create a large patch of ice at a targeted area, causing all foes that pass through it to lose their footing. Those caught in the Ice Slick are dramatically slowed, tend to fall down and will be unable to jump. Recharge: Slow
Ice_Slick.display_target_help: The Ice Slick has reduced your Running speed.

Flash_Freeze.display_help: You can Flash Freeze a large patch of ground beneath a targeted foe, instantly forming dozens of deadly ice shards that do Cold damage to all enemies in the area. The victims are left trapped within the icicles, but can break free if disturbed. Only targets near the ground can be affected. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Flash_Freeze.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Cold/Lethal), Foe Sleep
Flash_Freeze.display_target_help: You have been frozen and cannot act.

Glacier.display_help: You can freeze all foes around yourself in blocks of Glacial ice. The targets are frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. Even after the victims emerge, they remain chilled and their attack and movement speed is Slowed for a while. This power can only be cast near the ground. Recharge: Very Long
Glacier.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Glacier. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Jack_Frost.display_help: You can create a very powerful entity of animated ice at a targeted location. Jack Frost possesses several ice powers to attack any nearby foes and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Very Long
Jack_Frost.display_short_help: Summon Jack Frost: Melee Moderate DMG(Cold)

Chilblain.display_help: Immobilizes your target in an icy trap. Deals some damage over time and slightly Slows the target's attack and movement speed. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Chilblain.display_target_help: You have been frozen in place. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced and you are freezing.

Frozen_Fists.display_help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice, giving them the ability to quickly inflict moderate damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is Slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
Frozen_Fists.display_target_help: You have been chilled by the Frozen Fists. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Sword.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals higher damage then Frozen Fists. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You have been chilled by the Ice Sword. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed and damage. Recharge: Very Fast
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: Your Attack speed, Running speed and damage are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Ice_Patch.display_help: You emanate a patch of ice around you, which causes foes that step onto it to slip and fall down. This effect lasts until the ice melts. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Recharge: Slow

Shiver.display_help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Shiver.display_target_help: You are shivering. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced.

Freezing_Touch.display_help: This Freezing Touch will encase a single foe in a block of ice. This will deal minor damage as well as freezing them in their tracks, leaving them cold and helpless. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Freezing_Touch.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Freezing Touch.

Frozen_Fists.display_help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice, giving them the ability to quickly inflict minor damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is Slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Frozen_Fists.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Sword.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals good damage. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Frost.display_help: You create a short cone of Frost in front of you that can deal some damage and Slow a foe's speed, due to their uncontrollable shivering. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your Accuracy. Recharge: Long

Ice_Patch.display_help: You emanate a Patch of Ice around you. Foes that step onto the Ice Patch will slip and fall down. This effect lasts until the ice melts. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Recharge: Slow

Freezing_Touch.display_help: This Freezing Touch will encase a single foe in a block of ice. This will deal high damage over time, as well as freezing him in his tracks, leaving him cold and helpless. Damage:High(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Freezing_Touch.display_target_help: You have been frozen solid and cannot act.

Greater_Ice_Sword.display_help: Your mastery of Ice allows you to create an enhanced blade of solid ice that deals above average damage. Being hit by the Greater Ice Sword will Slow a villain's attack and movement speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Greater_Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Frozen_Aura.display_help: Your mastery of cold enables you to dramatically lower the temperature immediately around you. When you perform a Frozen Aura, nearby foes will be frozen within a fragile casing of ice and suffer a moderate amount of cold damage. These frozen foes will break free if attacked. Frozen Aura deals moderate damage. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Slow
Frozen_Aura.display_target_help: You have been chilled and cannot act until awakened.

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

Ice_Sword.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals good damage. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Ice Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and chill your enemies, dealing moderate damage and slowing all affected targets' movement and attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Ice_Sword_Circle.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Power_Boost.display_help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

Frost_Breath.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed. Recharge: Very Fast
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.

Greater_Ice_Sword.display_help: Ice Slash allows the user to create a blade of solid ice and strike a foe for high damage. Being hit by Ice Slash will Slow a foes' attack and movement speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Greater_Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Bolt.

Spectral_Wounds.display_help: Spectral Wounds convinces the target that they have taken severe damage. The illusion is so convincing that the victim can fall from the Spectral Wounds. However, the damage is not real, and if the victim survives long enough, the illusion will fade and some of the wounds will heal. Damage: High(Illusionary), Recharge: Moderate

Blind.display_help: Painfully Blinds a single targeted foe so severely that they are rendered helpless. Blind is so bright that additional foes may also be blinded, though they will not take any damage, and attacking them will free them from the effects. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Blind.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Psionic), Foe Hold/Sleep

Deceive.display_help: You can Deceive an enemy into believing their friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack their own allies. If you Deceive someone before they have noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Deceived enemy. Recharge: Moderate
Deceive.display_target_help: You have been confused. You may attack an incorrect target.

Flash.display_help: Generates a brilliant flash of light around you that blinds nearby foes. Flashed foes are rendered helpless and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Very Long

Group_Invisibility.display_help: Makes you and all teammates around you Invisible. While Invisible, you and your teammates are almost impossible to detect. Even if discovered, Group Invisibility grants a bonus to your Defense to all attacks, although you will lose some of your defense bonus if you attack. Group Invisibility has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Group_Invisibility.display_target_help: You have been made Invisible and are difficult to detect. Your Defense is increased as a result.

Phantom_Army.display_help: You can fabricate 3 Phantom heroes around a targeted foe. These Phantoms are not real, and are indestructible. Their attacks are similar to Spectral Wounds. Though they deal damage, it is illusory and will heal if the victim survives long enough. Phantoms are short lived and cannot be buffed or healed. Recharge: Very Long

Spectral_Terror.display_help: You can create an illusion of unspeakable Terror. The manifestation is so horrible that it caused most foes to tremble helplessly in terror. The Spectral Terror may also Terrify individual foes, causing them to run away in panic. Recharge: Slow

Phantasm.display_help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Very Long

Resist_Physical_Damage.display_help: You are naturally tough and inherently resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage as well as Defense Debuff effects. This power is always on, and costs no Endurance.

Temp_Invulnerability.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage. Recharge: Fast
Temp_Invulnerability.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage.

Dull_Pain.display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} and increase your maximum Hit Points.

Resist_Elements.display_help: You are naturally resistant to the elements and always take less Fire, Cold and Toxic Damage. You are also resistant to Slow effects. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Unyielding.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to all damage but Psionics, as well as Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(All DMG but Psionics; Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize)
Unyielding.display_attacker_hit: You now resist, Knockback, Disorientation, and all damage but Psionics with your {PowerName}, but your Defense is reduced.

Resist_Energies.display_help: You are naturally resistant to Energy and Negative Energy damage, as well as Debuff effects which reduce your endurance or recovery. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Invincibility.display_help: While this power is active, for each nearby foe in melee range you receive a bonus to Defense against all attacks but Psionics, and a bonus to your chance to hit. This power is most effective while fighting multiple opponents. The first foe you engage in melee grants the highest Defense bonus, and up to 10 foes can contribute to you Defense and ToHit Bonus. Recharge: Slow

Tough_Hide.display_help: Your thickened skin makes you much tougher to hit and resistant to Defense Debuff effects. This power is always on and costs no Endurance. Tough Hide offers no protection to Psionic Attacks.

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, Knockback and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Knockback, All DMG but Psionics)

Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your katana. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Gamblers_Cut.display_help: You perform a quick slash with your katana. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Gamblers_Cut.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Shuriken.display_help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast fire rate. You must be level 44 and have Web Grenade or Caltrops before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Flashing_Steel.display_help: You swing your katana in a wide arc in front of you, slicing multiple foes. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Flashing_Steel.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Divine_Avalanche.display_help: You can use your katana to parry incoming melee attacks and then quickly return the favor. Divine Avalanche does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

The_Lotus_Drops.display_help: You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
The_Lotus_Drops.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Soaring_Dragon.display_help: You perform a powerful Soaring Dragon maneuver that deals a great amount of damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Soaring_Dragon.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Golden_Dragonfly.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Katana attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Golden_Dragonfly.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Quick_Strike.display_help: A quick attack that sometimes knock foes down. Fast, but low damage. Damage: Low, Recharge: Fast

Body_Blow.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Quick Strike. Body Blow is capable of stunning an opponent occasionally. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Smashing_Blow.display_help: Smashing Blow is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to stun than body blow. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Power_Siphon.display_help: Power Siphon adds a small bonus to hit and modifies your other Kinetic Attack powers, so they are now capable of draining the strength of your enemies and adding that strength to you. This effect will stack up to 5 times. Recharge: Very Long

Repulsing_Torrent.display_help: Repulsing Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Burst.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be knocked down as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Focused_Burst.display_help: Projects a burst of focused power over a short distance. Focused Burst deals high damage and can possibly knock down your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Total_Focus.display_help: Concentrated Strike is a slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Concentrated Strike, recharge time is very long. Concentrated Strike Criticals do not result in extra damage, instead it instantly recharges the Power Siphon power. Damage: Extreme

Transfusion.display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate
Transfusion.display_target_help: Your Regeneration rate has been reduced.

Siphon_Power.display_help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow
Siphon_Power.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.
Siphon_Power.display_attacker_hit: You reduced the damage potential of {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} to increase your own!
Siphon_Power.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage potential with {PowerName} to increase their own!

Siphon_Speed.display_help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing their movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Long
Siphon_Speed.display_target_help: Your Running Speed potential has been altered. If this is a friendly power, your Running Speed is increased. If you were attacked with this power, though, your Running Speed is reduced.

Speed_Boost.display_help: You can hasten a single targeted ally. The target's movement speed, attack rate, and Endurance recovery are all greatly increased and the target gains resistance to Slow effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Speed_Boost.display_target_help: You've been granted a Speed Boost. Your Attack speed, Endurance recovery and Running speed are all increased and you are resistant to Slow effects.
Speed_Boost.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} {PlayerDest}, greatly increasing their movement rate, attack rate and endurance recovery!
Speed_Boost.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} improves your movement rate, attack rate and endurance recovery with an extra {PowerName}!

Transference.display_help: Transference drains an enemy of some of their Endurance and transfers that Endurance to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transference to recover Endurance for yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Slow

Fulcrum_Shift.display_help: Fulcrum Shift drains the power of a targeted foe and all foes nearby, transferring it to all adjacent allies, the caster, and those near the caster. Affected foes will deal less damage, while your affected allies will deal more. The more foes that are affected, the more power your allies receive. Fulcrum Shift can dramatically turn the tide of a melee battle. Recharge: Long
Fulcrum_Shift.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.

Thunder_Kick.display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Storm_Kick.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Storm Kick has a greater then average change to score a critical hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

Shuriken.display_help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast fire rate. You must be level 44 and have Web Grenade or Caltrops before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Cobra_Strike.display_help: Using intense martial arts focus, you can perform a Cobra Strike that deals minor damage, but has a great chance of Disorienting your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Focus_Chi.display_help: Tapping into your inner Chi greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Crane_Kick.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_help: You can perform a Crippling Axe Kick that deals moderate smashing damage, but has a chance to Immobilize your target, as well as Slowing their run speed. Crippling Axe Kick may also knock some flying entities out of the sky. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_target_help: The Crippling Axe Kick has crippled you. You are immobilized and your Running speed will be reduced once you can move again.

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Eagles_Claw.display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. Eagle's Claw has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Martial Arts attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Eagles_Claw.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +Special

Subdual.display_help: Subdual deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdual.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Mind_Probe.display_help: Grip the minds of your foe with a Mind Probe. You must be in close proximity to pull off this attack that wrecks havoc on your foes synapses, dealing moderate Psionic Damage while reducing their attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mind_Probe.display_target_help: The Mind Probe has slowed your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_Thrust.display_help: A focused attack or intense mental power that violently sends a nearby foe flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Drain_Psyche.display_help: You Drain the Psyche of you nearby foes, thus weakening their Hit Point Regeneration and Endurance Recovery and boosting your own. Recharge: Very Long

World_of_Confusion.display_help: This toggle power allows you to cause psionic damage and cause confusion within a group of foes, creating chaos. The chance of confusing an enemy is lower than then chance of damaging them, and it may take multiple hits to affect stronger opponents. All affected foes within the area will turn and attack each other, ignoring all heroes. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by Confused enemies. Recharge: Moderate
World_of_Confusion.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DoT(Psionic), Foe Confuse
World_of_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Scare.display_help: You entwine a single foe within their deepest fears and cause them to helplessly tremble for a brief while.

Psychic_Shockwave.display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Shockwave.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Mesmerize.display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering them unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mesmerize.display_target_help: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

Levitate.display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam them to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dominate.display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in their own mind and unable to defend themselves. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Confuse.display_help: You can Confuse an enemy, forcing that foe to believe their friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack their own allies. If you Confuse someone before they have noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Confused enemy. Recharge: Moderate
Confuse.display_target_help: You have been confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Mass_Hypnosis.display_help: Hypnotizes a group of foes at a distance and puts them to Sleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. This power deals no damage, but if done discreetly, the targets will never be aware of your presence. Recharge: Slow
Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: You have been Hypnotized and cannot act.

Total_Domination.display_help: Tears at the mind of a target foe and those near them. Dominate renders all affected foes helpless, lost in their own minds and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Very Long

Terrify.display_help: This power Terrifies foes within a cone area in front of you, causing them to tremble in Fear uncontrollably. The affect is so frightening and overwhelming, that the target takes real damage from the physiological response to this Psionic attack. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Mass_Confusion.display_help: You can cause Mass Confusion within a group of foes, creating chaos. All affected foes within the area will turn and attack each other, ignoring all heroes. If you Confuse villains before they noticed you, your presence will continue to go unnoticed. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by Confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long
Mass_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Hide.display_help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassin's Strike' with an Assassin's power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. No Endurance cost.

Ninja_Reflexes.display_help: Activating your Ninja Reflexes enables you to be more evasive to melee attacks. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Ninja Reflexes also grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast
Ninja_Reflexes.display_attacker_hit: Your Ninja Reflexes allow you to avoid melee attacks.

Danger_Sense.display_help: You become more evasive against ranged and area attacks while you have Danger Sense activated. This will increase your Defense versus ranged and Area of Effect attacks as long as it is active. Your Danger Sense also allow you to perceive stealthy foes and resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast
Danger_Sense.display_attacker_hit: Your Danger Sense allows you to easily avoid ranged attacks.

Caltrops.display_help: You toss a handful of Caltrops at a targeted location and spread the tiny metal spikes over a large area. Any enemy that passes over the Caltrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Caltrops.display_target_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Kuji-In_Rin.display_help: Kuji-In Rin is the strength of mind and body. By focusing your power on this exercise, you gain a resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilization, Confusion, and fear, as well as resistance to Psionic damage for a few minutes. Recharge: Very Long
Kuji-In_Rin.display_short_help: Self +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Psionics)
Kuji-In_Rin.display_attacker_hit: You are now highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear and Psionic damage.

Kuji-In_Sha.display_help: Kuji-In Sha invokes the power of Sha, or healing. Focusing your inner power, you can heal your body of its wounds and leave yourself resistant to the effects of Toxic damage for a while. Recharge: Long

Smoke_Flash.display_help: You throw a smoke bomb at your feet. The resulting flash of light and smoke can briefly distract your foes and Placate them so they can no longer find or target you. Combined with Hide, Smoke Flash is the perfect distraction to get out of a bad situation. Recharge: Very Long

Blinding_Powder.display_help: You throw a handful of Blinding powder in a wide arc at your foes. Most foes will be blinded, and unable to see. Some affected targets may be overcome by the powder that they may start attacking their own allies. If you attack the blinded foes, they will be alerted to your presence, but will continue to suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Very Long
