Blinding_Powder.display_target_help: Your have been blinded. You are helpless and confused.

Kuji-In_Retsu.display_help: Kuji-In Retsu is the mastery of space and time. Focusing your power on Retsu enables you to control your own time to easily defeat your foes. Mastery of this power enables you to avoid almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed, jumping height and Endurance Recovery are also increased. Retsu also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs. When Retsu wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Kuji-In_Retsu.display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit.

Nullify_Pain.display_help: Nullify Pain will heal nearby allies for some hit points by numbing the pain caused by their wounds. Nullify Pain is not as potent as Soothe, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Soothe.display_help: You heal an ally by numbing their pain and calming their mind. You cannot use this power on yourself.

Enforced_Morale.display_help: Enforced Morale frees an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Also, Enforced Morale grants the target clearer Perception to see hidden foes, and a minor recharge and movement speed boost. The Protection and Movement boosts will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level, although the Recharge and Movement boosts will only apply for the first few applications. If the ally is not damaged, Enforced Morale will cause them some pain before granting its benefits. Recharge: Fast
Enforced_Morale.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception, +Recharge, +Speed, Minor Damage
Enforced_Morale.display_target_help: Your mind has been cleared of negative effects, and you are granted temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and your Perception is improved.
Enforced_Morale.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
Enforced_Morale.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects.

Soothing_Aura.display_help: While this power is active all nearby allies will be healed by Soothing Aura every couple of seconds for a small portion of their health. (NOTE: While on PvP maps this power will grant affected targets a regeneration effect instead of a periodic heal.)
Soothing_Aura.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Minor Periodic Heal
Soothing_Aura.display_target_help: You are standing within a Soothing Aura, you will periodically recovery health.

World_of_Pain.display_help: When this power is activated the user and all nearby team members will gain a moderate damage, resistance, and to-hit bonus. Additionally those affected by this power will also be protected from Placate effects.
World_of_Pain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, damage resistance, damage output is increased. Additionally your resistance to Placate is increased.
World_of_Pain.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit, damage resistance, Placate protection and damage output.
World_of_Pain.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit, damage resistance, Placate protection and damage output with their {PowerName}!

Anguishing_Cry.display_help: You let out an Anguishing Cry causing a great deal of pain in your foes reducing their resistance and defense to damage for a short time.
Anguishing_Cry.display_target_help: Your resistance and defense has been reduced by the Anguishing Cry.
Anguishing_Cry.display_attacker_hit: You let out an {PowerName} reducing the defense and resistance of {PlayerDest}!
Anguishing_Cry.display_victim_hit: The harsh sound of {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} rings in your ears reducing your resistance and defense!

Painbringer.display_help: You transform an ally to pain incarnate turning them into an inexhaustible killing machine. While the character is imbued with this power they will benefit from incredible health regeneration, endurance recovery and improved damage potential for a short time.
Painbringer.display_target_help: You have been inspired to inflict a great deal of pain. Your regeneration, recovery and damage have been greatly increased!
Painbringer.display_attacker_hit: You empower {PlayerDest} with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and damage output
Painbringer.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} empowers you with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and damage output.

Entangle.display_help: Immobilizes your target by Entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny roots. The roots do smashing and lethal damage to the target over time. More resilient foes may require multiple applications to Immobilize. Entangle can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Entangle.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
Entangle.display_target_help: The roots have Entangled you, crushing and cutting you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

Strangler.display_help: Holds a distant foe by Strangling them with massive root-like vines. The target is held helpless, while they is slowly crushed by the vines. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Strangler.display_target_help: The Strangler Vine is crushing you and preventing you from acting.

Roots.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes by entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny Roots. Roots is slower and does less damage than Entangle, but it can capture multiple foes in one attack. Like Entangle, Roots can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Roots.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
Roots.display_target_help: The Roots have entangled you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

Spore_Burst.display_help: You hurl a large fungi pod at your foes. This pod is full of Spores that burst on impact, engulfing the target and all those around them. All affected targets may succumb to the narcotic effect of the Spores and will fall asleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Recharge: Slow
Spore_Burst.display_target_help: The Spore Burst has rendered you unconscious! Any damage will awaken you, however.

Seeds_of_Confusion.display_help: You throw a handful of seeds from a rare Baffle plant at your foes. The seeds spread out in a wide cone and release a dusty chaff that contain a number of alkaloids and hallucinogenic compounds. Foes that come into contact with these seeds become violently confused and will turn and attack each other, ignoring you and all your allies. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by Confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long
Seeds_of_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Spirit_Tree.display_help: You can tap into the elusive and powerful energy of the World Tree and extract a Spirit Tree at a targeted location. The Sprit Tree is immobile, but possesses incredible regenerative powers. The Regeneration Rate of you, or your allies, will be greatly increased as long as you are near the Spirit Tree. Recharge: Very Long

Vines.display_help: Creates a field of Strangler Vines that can Hold multiple foes at range. The affected targets are held helpless by the massive root-like vines. Unlike the power Strangler, this power does not deal any damage, but it can Hold multiple foes at once. Recharge: Very Long
Vines.display_target_help: The Vines are Holding you and preventing you from acting.

Carrion_Creepers.display_help: You can create a Creeper patch at a targeted location. The patch will snag foes, slowing their movement, and preventing them from jumping or flying. Additionally, a Creeper Vine will burst from under each live and defeated foe in the area and start attacking your enemies. Creeper Vines do minimal damage, but they can knock down your enemies and its poisonous thorns can slow your foes. Any foes that are defeated in the Creeper patch will also produce a growth of Entangle Roots that will Immobilize any enemies near the defeated foe. Recharge: Very Long

Fly_Trap.display_help: You can summon a giant carnivorous Fly Trap plant beast. Fly Trap may be an understatement, as this plant beast has a taste for flesh. The Fly Trap will viciously attack any nearby foes; biting, hurling poisonous Thorns and even casting its own Entangle Roots. The Fly Trap will fight by your side and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long
Fly_Trap.display_short_help: Summon Fly Trap: Ranged Control Special

Alkaloid.display_help: When used correctly, poisons can be used to heal, as well as harm. Alkaloid consists of just the right amount of amino acids to safely heal a single targeted ally. The healed target is also left with some resistance to Toxic Damage (This Toxic Damage Resistance cannot be Enhanced). You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Envenom.display_help: You Envenom your foe with a nasty poison. The toxin directly attacks the immune system, reducing the affected targets Defense, Damage Resistance and Hit Point Regeneration Rate. The poison is so potent, that the target actually responds less to Healing while affected by the poison. Recharge: Slow
Envenom.display_target_help: Your Defense, Damage Resistances and Regeneration have been reduced. You also Heal less from Heal powers.
Envenom.display_attacker_hit: You Envenom {PlayerDest} and reduced their Defense and Damage Resistance and Regeneration.
Envenom.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Defense, Damage Resistance and Regeneration with their {PowerName}!

Weaken.display_help: You poison a single foe with a venom that significantly Weakens their strength. The affected target's chance to hit and Damage output is severely reduced. Additionally, the affected targets secondary power effects are all weakened. The targets power effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all weakened. Recharge: Long
Weaken.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Damage potential and power effects have all been reduced.
Weaken.display_attacker_hit: You Weaken {PlayerDest} and reduce their chance to hit, damage and power effects.
Weaken.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your chance to hit, Damage and power effects with their {PowerName}!

Neurotoxic_Breath.display_help: You can breath a cone of Neurotoxin gas that quickly start to anesthetize any nearby foes. Affected targets may choke on the gas as their movement and attack rate are severely reduced. Recharge: Slow
Neurotoxic_Breath.display_target_help: You are choking on Neurotoxic gas. Your attack rate and movement speed are reduced.
Neurotoxic_Breath.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} dramatically Slows the attack speed and movement of {PlayerDest}

Antidote.display_help: This Antidote can free an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Slow, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. The Antidote also grants the target some resistance to Cold and Toxic damage. Some of the effects of this power will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
Antidote.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Slow, Cold, Toxic)
Antidote.display_target_help: The Antidote has granted you temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse and Fear and Immobilize effects and your resistance to Toxic and Cold Damage is improved.
Antidote.display_target_short_help: +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Slow, Cold, Toxic)
Antidote.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects as well as Toxic and Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
Antidote.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects and improves your resistance to Toxic and Cold Damage.

Paralytic_Poison.display_help: This Paralytic Poison viciously attacks a foe's nervous system and can leave an affected target completely Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Paralytic_Poison.display_target_help: The Paralytic Poison has left you completely Held and defenseless!
Paralytic_Poison.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to Hold you with a Paralytic Poison.

Psionic_Dart.display_help: This basic attack does minor Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed, but has a very fast attack rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Psionic_Dart.display_target_help: The Psionic Dart has slowed your Attack rate.

Mind_Probe.display_help: Grip the minds of your foe with a Mind Probe. You must be in close proximity to pull off this attack that wrecks havoc on your foes synapses, dealing moderate Psionic Damage while reducing their attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mind_Probe.display_target_help: The Mind Probe has slowed your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_Thrust.display_help: A focused attack of intense mental power that violently sends a nearby foe flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Drain_Psyche.display_help: You Drain the Psyche of you nearby foes, thus weakening their Hit Point Regeneration and Endurance Recovery and boosting your own. Recharge: Very Long

Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Psionic_Lance.display_help: This extremely long range Psionic attack has a bonus to Accuracy, and can Slow a target's attack rate. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Lance.display_target_help: The Psionic Lance has reduced your Attack rate.

Psychic_Shockwave.display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Shockwave.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Will_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Tornado.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Psionic), Foe Knockback
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: You are taking psionic damage over time.

Scramble_Thoughts.display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving them dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. Deals a little Psionic Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Psychic_Wail.display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Psychic_Wail.display_short_help: Close (AoE), Extreme DMG(Psionic), Foe Disorient -Recharge, Self -Recovery
Psychic_Wail.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Neutrino_Bolt.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Bolt can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

X-Ray_Beam.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

Irradiate.display_help: You can emit lethal amounts of radiation in all directions, damaging all nearby foes for a short time. Like other Radiation attacks, this power can bypass some of a target's defenses. Irradiate severely reduces the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Irradiate.display_target_help: You are irradiated and taking damage over time. Your Defense has been reduced.

Electron_Haze.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.display_short_help: Close, Moderate Cone DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback
Electron_Haze.display_target_help: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Proton_Volley.display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Proton_Volley.display_target_help: The Proton Volley has reduced your Defenses.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Cosmic_Burst.display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Cosmic_Burst.display_target_help: You are disoriented and your Defenses are reduced.

Neutron_Bomb.display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Neutron_Bomb.display_target_help: The Neutron Bomb has reduced your Defenses.

Atomic_Blast.display_help: This attack taps most of your stored energy to deal a devastating Atomic Blast. Any foes left standing will have their Defense greatly reduced and may be left helplessly chocking on toxic vapors. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Atomic_Blast.display_short_help: Close (AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Hold, -DEF, Self -Recovery
Atomic_Blast.display_target_help: The Atomic Blast has left you held and your defenses are reduced.

Radiant_Aura.display_help: You can use Radiant Aura to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

Radiation_Infection.display_help: Infects a targeted foe with deadly radiation, severely reducing their chance to hit and Defense. All foes that come near the target will also become infected. The Radiation Infection will last until you deactivate it, or until the original target is defeated. Recharge: Moderate
Radiation_Infection.display_target_help: The Radiation Infection has reduced your Defense and chance to hit.
Radiation_Infection.display_victim_hit: You have been weakened by a {PowerName} from {PlayerSource}, decreasing your chance to hit and defense!

Accelerate_Metabolism.display_help: Activating this power emits radiation that increases the running speed, attack speed, Endurance recovery, and damage potential of all nearby allies. Affected heroes' metabolisms are increased so much that they become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilization and Endurance Drain. Recharge: Very Long
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_target_help: Your metabolism has been boosted. Your movement speed and attack rate are improved. Your damage and Endurance recovery are increased as well. Lastly, you are resistant to Sleep, Mez, Disorient, Immobilization and Endurance Drain.
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_attacker_hit: You begin to accelerate your metabolism, and the metabolism of all nearby allies.
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} boosts your damage, speed, recharge, recovery and resistance to status effects with {PowerName}.

Enervating__Field.display_help: While this power is active, you irradiate a targeted foe, and all foes nearby, with a deadly dose of radiation. This radiation weakens exposed targets, decreasing the damage of their attacks. It also significantly weakens their resistance, so they will take much more damage from other attacks. Recharge: Moderate
Enervating__Field.display_target_help: Your Damage potential and Resistances have been reduced.
Enervating__Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.
Enervating__Field.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduced your damage and resistance to damage with an {PowerName}!

Lingering_Radiation.display_help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Lingering_Radiation.display_target_help: Your Attack rate, Running speed, and Regeneration rate have been reduced by the Lingering Radiation.
Lingering_Radiation.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} slows your attack speed, movement rate and regeneration rate with their {PowerName}

Choking_Cloud.display_help: While active, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long
Choking_Cloud.display_target_help: You are caught in a Choking Cloud.

EM_Pulse.display_help: You can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will drain the Endurance and HP Regeneration of all affected targets and leave them incapacitated and Held for a long while. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
EM_Pulse.display_short_help: PBAoE, Foe Hold, -END, -Regen, Special vs. Robots; Self -Recovery
EM_Pulse.display_target_help: You are Held by the EMP Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

Fast_Healing.display_help: You heal Hit Points at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Reconstruction.display_help: Through perfect control of your body, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. The effects of Reconstruction also leaves you resistant to Toxic damage for a while. Recharge: Long

Quick_Recovery.display_help: You recover Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Dull_Pain.display_help: Using ancient techniques, you can make yourself more resilient to pain. Thus, you can take more damage before being defeated. When you activate this power you will increase your maximum Hit Points for a couple of minutes. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

Integration.display_help: You can Integrate your mind and body, making you resistant to Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilization effects, as well as increase your regeneration rate, for as long as you can keep this toggle power active. Recharge: Fast
Integration.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize), +Regeneration
Integration.display_attacker_hit: You are now highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep and Knockback.

Resilience.display_help: You are more Resilient. This power allows you to build up a resistance to Disorientation effects. You tend not to get Disoriented, and if you do, it wears off quickly. This resistance to Disorientation gets stronger as you go up in level. Resilience also grants some resistance to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage. This power is always on.

Instant_Healing.display_help: When you activate this power, you can regenerate your health at an astounding rate. This boost to your Regeneration Rate lasts about a minute and takes a long time to recharge once used. Recharge: Very Long
Instant_Healing.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and start to Regenerate at an astonishing rate.

Revive.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can Revive yourself from the brink of death. You will revive with most of your Hit Points and half your Endurance and be protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Revive.display_target_help: You have Revived yourself. You are protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds.
Revive.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} yourself from the brink of death. You feel weak and cannot do anything for a while.

Moment_of_Glory.display_help: When you activate this power, you gain Resistance and Defense to all damage types except Psionics, recover Endurance more quickly, and are highly resistant to Knock Back, Sleep, Disorient, Immobilization, and Hold effects. Recharge: Very Long
Moment_of_Glory.display_short_help: Self +Res(All DMG but Psionics, Knock Back, Repel, Stun, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize), +DEF(All DMG but Psionics), +Recovery

Deflection.display_help: Your mastery of the shield allows you to easily deflect melee attacks, and attacks that do get through your ironclad defenses tend to do less damage. While Deflection is active the user will gain defense to melee attacks and some minor resistance to lethal and smashing damage. Recharge: Fast
Deflection.display_attacker_hit: You engage {PowerName} increasing your melee defense as well as your lethal and smashing resistance.

Battle_Agility.display_help: Your incredible agility allows you to position your shield to protect yourself from incoming ranged damage. While Battle Agility is active you will benefit from increased Ranged and AoE defense as well as some moderate protection from Defense Debuffs. Recharge: Fast
Battle_Agility.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} allows you to easily avoid ranged and area of effect attacks.

True_Grit.display_help: Your intense training has left you tougher than even the hardiest of heroes. You gain additional hit points and resistance to fire, cold, energy, negative energy and toxic damage sources. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.
True_Grit.display_short_help: Auto: Self +Res (Cold, Energy, Fire, Negative Energy, Toxic), +MaxHealth

Active_Defense.display_help: When you activate this power, it grants protection from Sleep, Disorient, Fear, Immobilize, Confusion, Repel, Knockback, Hold and Defense Debuff effects for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long
Active_Defense.display_short_help: Self Res (Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Repel, Knockback, Defense Debuff)
Active_Defense.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} protects you from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Confuse, Terrorize, Knockdown and Hold effects.

Against_All_Odds.display_help: The harder pressed you are in combat the greater your offensive abilities become. Each enemy that stands toe-to-toe with you in combat will grant you a damage bonus. The first foe you engage in melee grants the highest damage bonus, and up to 10 foes can contribute to this effect. Each foe in melee range also suffers from reduced damage as your shield deflects a portion of their damage. Recharge: Slow
Against_All_Odds.display_attacker_hit: You are ready for the worst, you gain a damage bonus for each foe you engage in melee.

Phalanx_Fighting.display_help: Fighting very near your allies allows you to deflect attacks much easier. You will gain a small bonus to your melee, ranged and area of effect defense. This bonus grows for each ally near you. This power is always on and costs no endurance.

Grant_Cover.display_help: You are able to use your shield to defend nearby allies. Any teammates who remain nearby gain a bonus to their defense. (NOTE: The defense bonus from this power is only applied to nearby team mates, but not yourself.) Additionally, while this power is active, the user and his team mates will gain some resistance to defense and recharge rate debuffs. Recharge: Slow
Grant_Cover.display_short_help: PBAoE, Team (but not self) +DEF(All but Psionic), Team +RES(Defense Debuff, Recharge Debuff)
Grant_Cover.display_target_help: Your shield bearing ally has improved your defense!
Grant_Cover.display_attacker_hit: You grant your allies cover and improve their defense.
Grant_Cover.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Defense with their {PowerName}!

One_with_the_Shield.display_help: When you activate this power, you gain strong resistance against most types of damage and also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, Knockback, Repel and Sleep effects. One with the Shield costs little Endurance to activate and increases your recovery and maximum hit points for its duration, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and substantially drained of Endurance. Note that One with the Shield is unaffected by Attack Rate changes. Recharge: Very Long
One_with_the_Shield.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Repel, Knockback, All DMG but Psi), +Recovery, +Max HP
One_with_the_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You become one with your shield and become much more resistant to damage, recover endurance at an increased rate and also have your maximum HP increased.

Shriek.display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target and weakening their Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Shriek.display_target_help: The sonic Shriek has weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.

Scream.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Scream.display_target_help: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your Damage Resistance has been reduced.

Howl.display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: Medium, Recharge: Slow
Howl.display_target_help: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Shockwave.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Shout.display_help: You blast your foe with a tremendous Shout, damaging them and reducing their Damage Resistance. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Shout.display_target_help: The sonic Shout has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Amplify.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

Sirens_Song.display_help: You send forth a subsonic pulse which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long
Sirens_Song.display_target_help: The Siren's Song has rendered you unconscious.

Dreadful_Wail.display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Dreadful_Wail.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, -Resist, Self -Recovery
Dreadful_Wail.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Sonic_Siphon.display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken their Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Siphon.display_target_help: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.
Sonic_Siphon.display_victim_hit: Your resistance to damage has been reduced by the {PowerName} of {PlayerSource}.

Sonic_Barrier.display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Barriers on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Barrier.display_target_help: The Sonic Barrier has increased your resistances to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage.
Sonic_Barrier.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from physical attacks with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Barrier.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Disruption_Field.display_help: You set up a constant wave of sonic energy around an ally, weakening the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Moderate
Disruption_Field.display_target_help: The Disruption Field creates an area around a target ally which reduces the Resistance of all foes near them.

Sonic_Dispersion.display_help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_help: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_short_help: +Res(All Damage but Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with {PowerName}.

Liquefy.display_help: You unleash a barrage of sonic waves on the Earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake. The impact of the sonic shockwave may Hold some foes and deal some minor damage. Most foes that pass through the location will fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their chance to hit and Defense. Recharge: Slow
Liquefy.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor Damage (Smashing/Energy), Foe Hold, Knockdown, -To-hit, -DEF

Barb_Swipe.display_help: Shred your opponent with several quick Swipes from your Spines. Barb Swipe deals minor damage over time. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Very Fast
Barb_Swipe.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Lunge.display_help: You can lunge forward, stabbing and poisoning a foe with the large Spine on your arm. Lunge deals moderate damage. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Lunge.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Spine_Burst.display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Spine_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Impale.display_help: You can throw a single large Spine at a targeted foe. This Spine does only moderate damage, but carries a large amount of the Spine toxin. A successful attack can completely Immobilize most foes, as well as Slowing them and dealing Toxic poison damage. Impale can also bring down flying entities. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Impale.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Running speed is reduced and you may be immobilized and unable to fly.

Ripper.display_help: You can unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all villains in a wide arc in front of you. Ripper deals massive damage and poisons multiple targets. It can even knock foes down. Spine poison Slows affected targets and deals additional Toxic damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Ripper.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Quill_Throwing.display_help: You can throw dozens of Spines in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the range. Spine throwing deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Quill_Throwing.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Mercurial_Blow.display_help: You strike your foe with a lightning fast blow from your staff dealing Light Smashing damage. The attack is so unexpected that the target's defenses are reduced slightly for a short time. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast
Mercurial_Blow.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Mercurial Blow.

Precise_Strike.display_help: You attempt to daze your foe with a heavy staff blow to their head. Precise Strike has a higher chance to hit than normal, deals Moderate Smashing damage, and has a small chance to disorient the target briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast.

Serpents_Reach.display_help: You fully extend your staff and release a burst of energy to lash out at a distant target and deal High Smashing damage with a good chance to knock your target down. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

Guarded_Spin.display_help: You spin your staff like a propeller in front of you dealing Light Smashing damage to enemies in your frontal arc and deflecting any incoming attacks, thus boosting your Melee and Lethal damage briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Guarded_Spin.display_target_help: Your Guarded Spin has increased your defense moderately.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Eye_of_the_Storm.display_help: With a lightning fast series of spins of your staff you strike at all nearby foes dealing moderate damage with a chance of knocking foes down. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection if the user has two or less levels, if the user has three levels of Perfection it will consume them and gain some benefit. 3 Levels of Perfection of Body will cause additional smashing damage and reduce damage resistance slightly for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Mind will cause additional psionic damage and reduce attack and movement speed for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Soul will cause additional energy damage and reduce defense for a short time. Critical Hit damage isn't enhanced by levels of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Eye_of_the_Storm.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Consumes Perfection
Eye_of_the_Storm.display_target_help: Eye of the Storm has been empowered by the user's Perfection levels causing it to have lingering effects.

Innocuous_Strikes.display_help: You repeatedly batter your foes' feet and legs with a flurry of sweeps of your staff. This attack deals Moderate Smashing damage to all foes within its cone. All affected targets will have their movement speed reduced, with a chance of being immobilized briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Innocuous_Strikes.display_short_help: Melee Cone, High DMG(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Speed
Innocuous_Strikes.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced!

Sky_Splitter.display_help: You leap into the air and hammer your foe with an overhead bash from your staff. Sky Splitter deals Extreme Smashing damage, will knock the target off their feet and leave them held briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection if the user has two or less levels, if the user has three levels of Perfection it will consume them and gain some benefit. 3 Levels of Perfection of Body will cause additional smashing damage and grant the user a bonus to damage resistance a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Mind will cause additional psionic damage and boost the user's chance to hit for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Soul will cause additional energy damage and increase the user's regeneration and recovery rate briefly. Critical Hit damage isn't enhanced by levels of Perfection. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Sky_Splitter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Disorient, Consumes Perfection

Rock_Armor.display_help: Your skin becomes stone while this power is active. Stone Armor protects you from Smashing and Lethal attacks. They are less likely to land and affect you. Stone Armor also grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs. Cannot be active at the same time as Granite Armor. Recharge: Fast
Rock_Armor.display_attacker_hit: You are now more defensive to smashing and lethal attacks.

Stone_Skin.display_help: Your tough skin is naturally resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Earths_Embrace.display_help: You are so connected to the Earth, you can draw upon its power to add to your own health. Activating this power increases your maximum Hit Points, and grants you resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
Earths_Embrace.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

Mud_Pots.display_help: While this power is active, you draw upon the geothermal power of the Earth to create a bubbling pool of hot mud around yourself. All foes in melee range will become snared and entrapped in the mud, Immobilizing some and slowing others. The boiling heat from Mud Pots may also deals some damage over time to the snared foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Mud_Pots.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize, -SPD
Mud_Pots.display_target_help: The Mud Pots are burning you and reducing your Running speed. You may be immobilized, as well.

Rooted.display_help: While this power is active, you merge with the Earth and draw forth its power to become resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient and Endurance Drain effects, and increase your Hit Point Regeneration rate. You must remain in close contact with the Earth, so you will move extremely slow and you cannot active Fly powers, Sprint, Super Speed, or Jump powers while this power is active. Rooted also grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast
Rooted.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, End Drain, DeBuff DEF), Self -SPD, +Regeneration
Rooted.display_attacker_hit: You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient and Endurance Drain effects, and increase your Hit Point Regeneration rate while {PowerName}, but move slowly and cannot jump or fly.

Brimstone_Armor.display_help: While this power is active, your skin becomes encrusted in cracked magma. Brimstone Armor makes you highly resistant to Fire and Cold damage. Cannot be active at the same time as Granite Armor. Recharge: Fast
Brimstone_Armor.display_attacker_hit: You are now more resistant to fire and cold damage.

Crystal_Armor.display_help: While this power is active, your skin becomes encrusted in various quartz crystals. Crystal Armor makes Energy and Negative Energy attacks less likely to hit. This power also grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs. Cannot be active at the same time as Granite Armor. Recharge: Fast
Crystal_Armor.display_attacker_hit: You now diffract energy and negative energy attacks.

Minerals.display_help: Activating this power summons several rare earth rock Minerals to orbit around you. These Minerals can disperse thought patterns and make Psionic attacks less likely to hit. They also bring clarity of the mind and increase your Perception to see hidden foes, and grant resistance to Confusion. Cannot be active at the same time as Granite Armor. Recharge: Fast
Minerals.display_attacker_hit: Your Mineral Armor now deflects psionic attacks and grants you resistance to Confusion and Stealth.

Granite_Armor.display_help: When you activate this power, you are transformed into a massive bulk of unyielding Granite. Your incredible mass makes you almost completely invulnerable and resistant to most effects. However, you also become quite heavy, cannot fly, your attack and movement speed are Slowed and you do less damage. Granite Armor also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs.Cannot be active at the same time as other Armors in this set, Fly powers, Sprint, Super Speed, or Jump powers. Recharge: Slow
Granite_Armor.display_attacker_hit: Your Granite Armor has made you practically invulnerable!

Stone_Fist.display_help: Your stone covered fists attack swiftly for moderate damage, and may Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Stone_Fist.display_short_help: Melee Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient

Heavy_Stone_Fist.display_help: Your control over the earth allows you to form a mallet of solid stone. This Stone Mallet deals heavy damage, and can knock down weak foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Fault.display_help: This powerful stomp can cause a seismic disturbance. This will crack the Earth itself and send a Fault towards a targeted foe, throwing him and nearby enemies into the air and possibly Disorienting them. Fault deals no damage on its own. Recharge: Slow

Seismic_Smash.display_help: This massive attack hits with all the force of the Earth itself. It deals tremendous amounts of damage, and may Hold the target if they are not defeated outright. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Seismic_Smash.display_target_help: You have been held by the crushing earth.

Hurl_Boulder.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals high damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Hurl_Boulder.display_target_help: You have been hit by a Hurled Boulder and cannot fly.

Tremor.display_help: You can cause a localized earthquake immediately around you. This will deal moderate damage to every foe in melee range, while knocking them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Gale.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

O2_Boost.display_help: Saturates the air around a targeted ally with rich oxygen, healing their wounds. The O2 Boost can protect a targeted ally from Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects as well as increase perception. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast
O2_Boost.display_target_help: The O2 Boost has improved your resistance to Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects.

Snow_Storm.display_help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. The torrent winds of the Snow Storm are enough to bring down flying foes. Recharge: Slow
Snow_Storm.display_target_help: Your attack rate and running speed have been reduced by the Snow Storm. The Torrent winds are hindering your ability to Fly.
Snow_Storm.display_attacker_hit: You Slow the attack and movement speed of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.

Steamy_Mist.display_help: Your mastery of the elements allows you to hide yourself and all nearby allies within a Steamy Mist. Steamy Mist makes you and your allies harder to see and increases your Defense bonus to all attacks, while reducing Fire, Cold, and Energy damage, as well as your Foes ability to Confuse you. You cannot use any other Concealment type powers while using Steamy Mist. Recharge: Slow
Steamy_Mist.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF(All), +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Confuse)
Steamy_Mist.display_target_help: The Steamy Mist is making you more difficult to detect. This increases your Defense and gives you some resistance to Fire, Cold, Energy and Confuse.

Fog.display_help: Summons Freezing Rain at a targeted location. Freezing Rain deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Fog.display_target_help: The Freezing Rain is causing cold damage to you and has reduced your damage potential, resistance, attack rate and running speed.

Hurricane.display_help: You can summon a Hurricane. The wind and rain from this massive storm reduce the range and chance to hit of nearby foes. The massive winds of this storm continuously force foes away from you. Recharge: Slow
Hurricane.display_target_help: Hurricane Force winds are reducing the visual range and chance to hit of all enemies around the Storm Summoner!
Hurricane.display_attacker_hit: You reduce the range and chance to hit of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.
Hurricane.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your range and chance to hit with their {PowerName}!

Thunder_Clap.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Thunder Clap that will Disorient most foes in a large area around you. Recharge: Slow
Thunder_Clap.display_target_help: The Thunder Clap has left you Disoriented.

Tornado.display_help: Conjures up a funnel cloud at a targeted location. The Tornado will chase down your foes, tossing them into the air and hurling them great distances. The victims are left Disoriented and with reduced Defense. The Tornado is a menacing sight, and can even cause panic among your foes. Recharge: Long
Tornado.display_short_help: Summon Tornado: PBAoE Minor DAM (Smash), Foe Knockback, Fear, Disorient
Tornado.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented by the Tornado.

Lightning_Storm.display_help: You can create a massive Lightning Storm that will strike any foe that approaches you. Lightning from this storm can knock down and damage all nearby foes, and can even instill panic. Lightning bolts will continue to fall as long as the storm remains. Recharge: Long
Lightning_Storm.display_short_help: Create Storm: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe -End

Focused_Fighting.display_help: You become more evasive to melee attacks while you have Focused Fighting activated. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and DeBuffs to Defense. Recharge: Fast
Focused_Fighting.display_attacker_hit: You Focus your Fighting ability and can now easily avoid melee attacks.

Focused_Senses.display_help: You become more evasive against ranged attacks while you have Focused Senses activated. This will increase your Defense versus ranged attacks as long as it is active. Your Improved Senses also allow you to perceive stealthy foes as well as resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast
Focused_Senses.display_attacker_hit: You Focus your Senses and can now easily avoid ranged attacks.

Agile.display_help: You become innately more Agile, and are able to naturally avoid some ranged attacks and resist Defense DeBuffs. Your Agility also grants you minor Damage Resistance to all damage except Toxic and Psionic. This Damage Resistance is only available as you lose Health but it improves as your HP declines. This power is always on, and will permanently increase your Defense versus ranged attacks.
Agile.display_short_help: Auto: Self +DEF(Ranged), Res(DeBuff DEF), Res(Damage, Special)

Practiced_Brawler.display_help: Your training has allowed you to become a Practiced Brawler, tuning you into a perfect fighting machine. You gain a resistance to Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilization powers for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long
Practiced_Brawler.display_attacker_hit: You are now highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep and Knockback.

Dodge.display_help: You have the ability to innately Dodge some melee attacks and you resist Defense DeBuffs. Dodge also grants you minor Damage Resistance to all damage except Toxic and Psionic. This Damage Resistance is only available as you lose Health but it improves as your HP declines. This power is always on, and will permanently increase your Defense versus melee attacks.
Dodge.display_short_help: Auto: Self +DEF(Melee), Res(DeBuff DEF), Res(Damage, Special)

Quickness.display_help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Quickness.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Lucky.display_help: Your superior reflexes make you seem incredibly Lucky. Lucky improves your Defense to Area of Effect attacks and grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs. Lucky also grants you minor Damage Resistance to all damage except Toxic and Psionic. This Damage Resistance is only available as you lose Health but it improves as your HP declines. This power is always on, and permanently increases your chance to evade area effects and cone shaped attacks.
Lucky.display_short_help: Auto: Self +DEF(vs. AoE), Res(DeBuff DEF), Res(Damage, Special)

Evasion.display_help: You are Evasive against area effect and cone shaped attacks. This power increases your Defense versus such attacks as long as it is active. Evasion also helps you resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast
Evasion.display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Evasive and can more easily Evade area of effect and cone attacks.

Elude.display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed, jumping height, and Endurance Recovery are also increased. Elude also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Elude.display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit.

Jab.display_help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Punch.display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off their feet, unable to attack again until they stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Haymaker.display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Hand_Clap.display_help: You can clap your hands together with such force that you create a deafening shockwave. This shockwave can knock back nearby foes, and they have a chance to become Disoriented due to the shock to the inner ear. Hand Clap deals no damage. Recharge: Slow

Knockout_Blow.display_help: You can perform a Knockout Blow on your opponent. This punch does Superior damage, and has a great chance of Holding your target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Rage.display_help: A Rage comes over you, sending you into a berserker fury. While Raging, your damage and chance to hit are dramatically increased. However, when your Rage subsides, you are left with reduced Defense, drained of some of your Endurance, and your attacks are substantially weakened. Recharge: Very Long
Rage.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has greatly increased your damage and accuracy!

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals high damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You have been hit by a piece of concrete and cannot fly.

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Warmth.display_help: You can use your Warmth to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

Fire_Shield.display_help: Casts a Thermal Shield on one of your allies and grants them damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Thermal Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. You cannot stack multiple Thermal Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Plasma Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Fire_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Smashing, Lethal, Fire and Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
Fire_Shield.display_victim_hit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, and Cold damage, due to the {PowerName} from {PlayerSource}.

Cauterize.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Thaw.display_help: Warms an ally and frees them from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Slow and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Thaw also grants the target some resistance to Cold damage. Some of the effects of this power will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
Thaw.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Cold, Slow)
Thaw.display_target_help: You have been Thawed. You now have temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear and slow effects and your resistance to Cold is improved.
Thaw.display_target_short_help: +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Cold, Slow)
Thaw.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Cold, Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
Thaw.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Cold, Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, and Immobilize effects.

Forge.display_help: Forge a single ally target into a killing machine. Forge immensely enhances a single ally's Damage and chance to hit. Recharge: Long
Forge.display_target_help: You have been Forged into a killing machine. Your Damage and chance to hit have all been increased.
Forge.display_attacker_hit: You greatly increase the Damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest}.
Forge.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your Damage and chance to hit.

Heat_Exhaustion.display_help: Overwhelm a single foe with waves of exhausting heat. The initial effect will drain the target of some Endurance, but the heat is so overwhelming that the affected target will be weakened. Their Damage output, Endurance Recovery and Hit Point Regeneration will all be reduced. Recharge: Long
Heat_Exhaustion.display_target_help: Your Damage output, Endurance Recovery and HP Regeneration have been reduced.
Heat_Exhaustion.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Damage output, Endurance Recovery and HP Regeneration of {PlayerDest}.
Heat_Exhaustion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Damage output, Endurance Recovery and HP Regeneration.

Melt_Armor.display_help: The searing Heat from this power is enough to Melt the Armor and defenses of all targets in the affected area. Melt Armor significantly weakens the Defense and Damage Resistance of the affected targets. Recharge: Long
Melt_Armor.display_target_help: Your Defense and Damage Resistances have been reduced.
Melt_Armor.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Defense and Damage Resistance of {PlayerDest}.
Melt_Armor.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Defense and Damage Resistance.

Thorny_Darts.display_help: Hurls small Thorny Darts at your foes. Thorny Darts deal minor damage. Poison from the Darts deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Thorny_Darts.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Skewer.display_help: You lunge forward with this melee attack and Skewer your foe with the large Thorn on your arm. Deals moderate damage and poisons your foe. Poison from the Thorns deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Skewer.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Fling_Thorns.display_help: You can throw dozens of Thorns in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the area. These Thorns deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes' Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fling_Thorns.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Impale.display_help: You can throw a small cluster of large Thorns at a targeted foe. These Thorns carry a large amount of the toxin. In addition to dealing Toxic damage, a successful attack can slow a target, preventing Running, Jumping or Flying. Most foes will likely be completely Immobilized, unable to run. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Impale.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Running speed is reduced and you may be immobilized and unable to run, jump or fly.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Thorn_Burst.display_help: You can explode dozens of Thorns in all directions around you. These Thorns only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Toxic damage from the thorns can reduce the Defense of affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Thorntrops.display_help: You fling dozens of Thorns into the ground at a targeted location. The small Thorns pepper the ground over a large area. Any enemy that pass over the Thorntrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Thorntrops.display_target_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Ripper.display_help: You can unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all foes in a wide arc directly in front of you. Ripper deals massive damage and poisons multiple targets. It can even knock foes down. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Ripper.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Thorn_Barrage.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Thorn Barrage unleashes your Thorns at high velocity causing severe damage at close range. Although these Thorns only travel a short distance, their impact can knock most foes on their back. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Barrage.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Time_Crawl.display_help: You're able to dramatically slow the time around a single enemy, reducing their movement speed and attack rate. Time is slowed to such an extreme that their wounds will take longer to heal, reducing their regeneration rate. Time Crawl applies the Delayed effect on its target. Debuff and control effects from other Time Manipulation powers are increased on targets affected by Delayed. Recharge: Long.
Time_Crawl.display_target_help: Your attack rate, movement speed and regeneration rate have been reduced

Temporal_Mending.display_help: You mend the wounds of yourself and nearby allies by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured. Temporal Mending will immediately heal its targets and continue to heal them for an equal amount over the next 6 seconds. Additionally, affected allies will gain some resistance to slow effects and regeneration debuffs. Allies affected by the Accelerated effect will receive additional healing from this power. Temporal Mending will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Long
Temporal_Mending.display_short_help: PBAoE, Ally +Heal, Heal Over Time, +Res(Slow, Regen Debuff)

Times_Juncture.display_help: You create a time dilation field around you causing enemies who get too close to be slowed to a crawl, their movement speed, damage and chance to hit will be decreased substantially. Enemies affected by Delayed have these affects increased. Recharge: Slow
Times_Juncture.display_target_help: The flow of time has been dramatically slowed around the foe using Time's Juncture reducing your damage, speed and chance to hit.
Times_Juncture.display_attacker_hit: You reduce the damage, movement speed and chance to hit of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.
Times_Juncture.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage, speed and chance to hit with their {PowerName}!

Temporal_Selection.display_help: You distort time around an ally, selecting a period of time where their abilities are at their highest. Their damage, attack rate and regeneration rates are dramatically increased for a brief period. This power places the Accelerated effect on the target. While this is in effect, the target has any healing and healing over time effects from Temporal Mending or Chrono Shift significantly increased. Recharge: Very Long
Temporal_Selection.display_target_help: Your movements have been sped up as if you're flowing more quickly through time. You gain a significant bonus to your damage, recharge rate and regeneration.
Temporal_Selection.display_attacker_hit: You significantly increase {PlayerDest}'s damage, recharge rate and regeneration for a short time.
Temporal_Selection.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your Damage, Recharge Rate and Regeneration.

Distortion_Field.display_help: You can choose an area to slow the flow of time down to a crawl. Enemies who enter the field will have their attack rate and speed slowed dramatically. In addition, affected enemies might become held as they are frozen in time. Targets affected by Time Crawl will have the chance to be held increased. Recharge: Very Long
Distortion_Field.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Foe(-Recharge, -Speed), Chance for Hold
Distortion_Field.display_target_help: The Distortion Field has reduced your Recharge and Movement Speed.
Distortion_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces your targets' Movement and Recharge Speed.

Time_Stop.display_help: You trap your target within the flow of time causing them to be held helpless. Even those resistant to the effects of Time Stop's hold will still have their regeneration rate and healing effects reduced for a brief period. Targets affected by Time Crawl will suffer from a more powerful hold, however its benefits are brief. Recharge: Long
Time_Stop.display_target_help: You have been held by Time Stop. Your healing effects and regeneration rate have also been reduced.

Farsight.display_help: You give your allies a brief glimpse of the future and what is to come. This provides you and your team a moderate increase to your chance to hit and defense for a short period of time. Recharge: Very Long
Farsight.display_target_help: You have brief glimpses of the future allowing you to predict your foes' movements. Your Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit is increased briefly.
Farsight.display_attacker_hit: You grant your allies the ability to briefly glimpse into the future thus increasing their Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit.
Farsight.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} boosts your Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit with {PowerName}.

Slowed_Response.display_help: You manipulate time around a targeted foe causing their reflexes to become slowed and sluggish. This causes them to have decreased defense and damage resistance. A target affected by Time Crawl will suffer from a more powerful effect. Recharge: Very Long
Slowed_Response.display_target_help: Your defense and resistance has been lowered by Slowed Response.
Slowed_Response.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces the defenses and resistances of your target and nearby foes.
Slowed_Response.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your defense and resistances with their {PowerName}

Chrono_Shift.display_help: You cause nearby allies to act more quickly by allowing them to slip through the time stream seamlessly. When Chrono Shift is activated, you and nearby allies will immediately recover a portion of your health and endurance. Chrono Shift will greatly increase the Recharge Speed of nearby allies for the duration of the power, additionally for a short while the flow of time will constantly undo a portion of your allies' wounds causing them to periodically recover health and recover endurance. An ally affected by Temporal Selection will recover additional health from Chrono Shift. Chrono Shift will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Very Long
Chrono_Shift.display_short_help: PBAoE, Team +Recharge, Heal, +End, Moderate Healing over Time, +Recovery

Defensive_Sweep.display_help: You take a defensive stance and strike your opponent. Successfully executing this attack will cause light smashing damage to your opponent, while giving you increased defense against their melee attacks. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast
Defensive_Sweep.display_target_help: Your Defense has been increased by your Defensive Sweep.

Crushing_Blow.display_help: You swing a mighty crushing blow at your opponent dealing High Smashing damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Throwing_Knives.display_help: With your natural origin you have to rely on your cunning and skill. You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal. You can throw these knives at a very short range, and deal minor Lethal damage to your target, but a nasty wound will do additional Damage over Time. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Fast
Throwing_Knives.display_target_help: You are taking additional Damage over Time from the wound left by the Throwing Knife.

Follow_Through.display_help: You Follow Through with a massive attack dealing Superior Smashing damage, knocking your opponent down and possibly stunning them. Additionally, Follow Through can cause the target to suffer a small amount of Lethal damage over time. NOTE: Follow Through requires Momentum in order to be activated. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Long
Follow_Through.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smashing), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Stun, Requires Momentum

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Sweeping_Strike.display_help: You make a sweeping slash with your weapon, causing high damage and possibly knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

Shatter_Armor.display_help: You batter your enemy with your mighty weapon dealing Extreme Smashing damage and reducing their resistance to damage as well as their defense to all types of attacks for a short time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
Shatter_Armor.display_target_help: You are bruised and dazed, which reduces your damage resistance and defense.

Whirling_Smash.display_help: You perform a powerful Whirling Smash that deals Moderate Smashing damage, and can knock an opponent down. Additionally, Whirling Smash can cause the target to suffer a small amount of Lethal damage over time. NOTE: Whirling Smash requires Momentum in order to be activated. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Smash.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Requires Momentum

Arc_of_Destruction.display_help: You swing your weapon in a devastating Arc of Destruction that deals Superior Smashing damage and has a good chance to knock foes down. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Entangling_Arrow.display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities, halts jumping and slows all of your actions. Entangle Arrow has a fairly low Endurance cost and a bonus to its Accuracy. Recharge: Fast
Entangling_Arrow.display_target_help: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your actions are slowed.

Flash_Arrow.display_help: This arrow explodes in a dazzling flash of light and sound. The targets are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Flash_Arrow.display_target_help: The flash of light has left you dazzled. Your chance to hit and range of sight are greatly diminished.

Glue_Arrow.display_help: This arrow carries a cartridge of intensely sticky glue, which explodes on impact. The glue slows the movement and attack rates of any foes in the area. Recharge: Very Slow

Ice_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Arrow.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Poison_Gas_Arrow.display_help: This arrow carries a capsule cloud of poisonous gas, which explodes on impact and weakens all foes in its vicinity. Affected foes damage potential will be severely reduced. Some foes will react badly to the poison and choke for a time, though they will react if attacked. Recharge: Slow

Acid_Arrow.display_help: This arrow explodes in a small shower of acid on impact. This acid eats through armor, causing damage over time. It reduces the target's Defense as well as their Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Acid_Arrow.display_target_help: Your Resistances and Defense have been weakened by the Acid Arrow.
Acid_Arrow.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} splashes acid on {PlayerDest}, reducing their resistances to damage.
Acid_Arrow.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with an Acid Arrow. The acid is burning you and reducing your damage resistance.

Disruption_Arrow.display_help: This arrow plants a sonic resonator at a target location. The vibrations of the resonator weaken the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Long
Disruption_Arrow.display_target_help: The Disruption Arrow has lowered your Resistances.

Oil_Slick_Arrow.display_help: On impact, this arrow creates an oil slick that Slows foes in the area and may cause them to slip and fall. The oil slick is very flammable and may burst into flames if fire is used near it. Recharge: Long
Oil_Slick_Arrow.display_target_help: The oil slick has reduced your running speed.

EMP_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
EMP_Arrow.display_short_help: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery
EMP_Arrow.display_target_help: You are held immobile by the EMP Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

Bash.display_help: You perform a Bashing attack with your mace that deals moderate damage, and can sometimes Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Pulverize.display_help: You attempt to Pulverize your opponent. This attack is slower than Bash but causes more damage. It also has a chance of Disorienting your opponent for a brief time. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Throwing_Knives.display_help: With your natural origin you have to rely on your cunning and skill. You've acquired these throwing knives as part of your personal arsenal.
